timeline.bodyText: Because you removed the prefix, I'm not so happy with the resulting core label. You also have an SDK core, it seems confusing. This has nothing todo with this PR though, so LGTM
timeline.author: alexvanboxel

replies.bodyText:
Again it is a question of tradeoffs, we don't have an 'sdks' category so the argument of the second core does not hold (even if we have sdks/core).
Alex I did not do this to annoy you and please excuse me if you misinterpreted the fact that I removed the prefixes as abusive, I just wanted to get things done quickly and not to annoy you with extra requests. I will pay more attention in the future.
I think that the version without the prefixes is better for readability and usability arguments, prove me that the version with prefixes is simpler and better and I don't hesitate to change to it, but I am still unconvinced of what we win with the extra prefix vs the extra noise and reduced readability it brings specially when the prefixes are already covered by the general categories.
replies.author: iemejia
